summary.description: The eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium brings together leading experts in software engineering and machine learning to discuss the challenges of developing complex data-intensive software systems.

program_highlights.title: AgentOps Day
program_highlights.focus: Keynotes, sessions, and discussions focused on operationalizing intelligent agents.

program_highlights.title: Intelligent Systems
program_highlights.focus: Presentations, expert talks, and discussions on AI-enhanced systems and sustainability.

program_highlights.title: Tutorials and SEMTL Meeting
program_highlights.focus: Hands-on tutorials and the SEMTL meeting.

summary.community_invitation: Practitioners and researchers from all related fields are invited to participate.
